dict.string:
Symptoms:

Unable to query AO so not saving data -- but didn't say that, kept running script until it got to the end and I looked for the data and found it wasn't there. File numbers WERE incrementing where it says "Name of next file" Ran through whole script, saying "Clio take images complete" after each nimg.

Second day: Same problem. New manifestation:

Error in ao_comm.log:

[obs@clio1 Programs]$ tail -20 ao_com.log
Error: failed to write complete request to socket. 4 chars left.


10/31/2014 03:17:38: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_sock.c line 234
Sending to server:
All

Error: failed to write complete request to socket. 4 chars left.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DAY 3:

11/01/2014 21:24:23: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_sock.c line 302
Error: Read on socket failed. Returned -1


ALSO happening when clicking "Take Images"
and it updated the file number and said it took images.
Again I only noticed when I went to look for the FITS files and they weren't there.


11/02/2014 02:50:37: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_sock.c line 234
Sending to server:
All


11/02/2014 02:50:37: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_sock.c line 302
Error: Read on socket failed. Returned 0

Got from server:

Sending to server:

11/02/2014 02:52:09: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_sock.c line 106
Error: failed to write complete request to socket. 4 chars left.


11/02/2014 02:58:32: /home/obs/MBEcode/ao_comm//ao_cli.c line 100
Opened socket connection to AO system at 139.229.110.35, port 7102.



Querying AO system for header values.
Size: (1024,512), Coadds: 10, File: /home/obs/Data/clio20141101_02/TrapWide00002.fit
Int: 280, Use dark: False, Nod: beam 0, ra -7.40, dec 0.81
Use data cube: False, Take short cal. image: False, PCR sync: False, lod file: tim.full.lod

Enter Selection:

Error: Unknown command ""




--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Diagnostics of "all" command to MMTI:

  • Jared is seeing an "all" request from Clio every 3 seconds.
  • The error about "4 chars left" means it didn't receive ANY of the command since the command "/all" is 4 characters.
  • Other Clio computer communications seem fine -- Guanaco is running clio just fine, Transfer files is running smoothly, etc.

Only working solutions:

  • Killclio
Or
  • Close camera control program, restart MMTI, restart Clio component.
As according to
http://zero.as.arizona.edu/groups/clio2usermanual/wiki/66709/Troubleshooting_Pages.html

Unsatisfactory because:

  • Have to killclio
  • Doesn't warn you when ao_com error keeps from saving data


-Katie Morzinski, 2014/10/31
